title: Self-Directed Mathematics Learning Design Through MOOC-Based Self-Monitoring Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematics fundamentals and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning environments using digital devices, establishment of personalized feedback systems for individual learners

learning_goals: Learners can achieve ≥80% of weekly learning objectives using quizzes and problem-solving tutorials provided in MOOCs
Learners can record and analyze their cognitive and metacognitive processes via reflective questioning once weekly
Learners can revise learning strategies ≥2 times by synthesizing peer evaluations and instructor feedback

resources: Digital learning tools (quiz generator, progress chart)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
